slowing the rate of the body's functions: These drugs have a depressant effect.
More examplesFewer examplesIt can intensify alcohol's effects and is also said to be more dangerous when taken with other depressant drugs.The brain becomes more alert as the depressant effects of alcohol fade.People often think the stimulant effect of caffeine counteracts the depressant effect of alcohol, but that's not true.Because the respiratory depressant effects of methadone may last up to 48 hours, there may be a considerable time during which the victim appears to be asleep and snoring, although unwakeable.The drug is depressant to the central nervous system at therapeutic doses.
